ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. John I. Laskin ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. JOHN I. LASKIN, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for Ontario, effective March 19, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
